name: cartterr-portfolio
description: José Carter Arriagada's Professional Portfolio - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && yarn install --frozen-lockfile && yarn build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && yarn install --frozen-lockfile && yarn build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && yarn install && cd ../backend && yarn install
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend

author: José Carter Arriagada <jose.carterx@gmail.com>
